Headline: #121 Union/Streeterville Express and #120 Ogilvie/Wacker Express Temporary Reroute near Lower Wacker/Adams
ShortDescription: 121 Union/Streeterville Express and 120 Ogilvie/Wacker Express buses temporarily rerouted due to, street blockage near Lower Wacker/Adams.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#121 Union/Streeterville Express and #120 Ogilvie/Wacker Express buses temporarily rerouted due to, street blockage near Lower Wacker/Adams.

Northbound #121 Union/Streeterville Express buses will operate via Jackson, Upper Wacker, LaSalle, Illinois and over regular route.

Northbound #120 Ogilvie/Wacker Express buses will operate via Washington, Franklin, Upper Wacker, LaSalle, Illinois and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Van Buren/Ashland
ShortDescription: Westbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Loomis, Adams, Ogden and Van Buren: due to, fire department activity near Van Buren/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Loomis, Adams, Ogden and Van Buren: due to, fire department activity near Van Buren/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
